title: sorry! we've detected some possible data corruption in your installation.
body:
sorry! we've detected some possible data corruption in your installation.we will now attempt to repair the affected files
what's wrong ??????????????? fix the bug pls

replies.body: That error means that your installation was either missing some game files or they were damaged somehow due to connection/antivirus/firewall issues. Be sure to let that repair finish up in order to fix up your copy of the game!

ive had this issue for the past hour and a half i am no longer able to login  or  load into a game without it bug splatting  and repairing i have uninstalled and reinstalled i have used hextech   repair.  i let it repair 9 times.  and still nothing is fixing it .

Strange, something must be messing with the files as they're being repaired making it so they can be fixed properly. Reach out to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with some logs using the HRT and they should be able to figure things out.
